channel.title: What to change in this int? To fix this icon

item.title: What to change in this int? To fix this icon
item.dc:creator: @DevotionPk DevotionPk
item.description:
@DevotionPk wrote:

Added a costum Godsword On request of the players.

But the icon is realy strange.
How to fix this?

here is the int:

case 15557: itemDef.name = "Divine Godsword"; itemDef.description = "The divine sword.".getBytes(); itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wield"; itemDef.modelID = 44444; itemDef.anInt165 = 44445; itemDef.anInt200 = 44445; itemDef.modelZoom = 1400; itemDef.modelRotation1 = 700; itemDef.modelRotation2 = 60; itemDef.modelOffset1 = 25; itemDef.modelOffset2 = 60; break;

Read full topic
item.source: What to change in this int? To fix this icon
